summary: Build a professional, high-quality e-commerce website/template (Amazon/Shopify-like) intended for resale, including logo/email areas and support for up to 100 products with product images.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal modern store logo mark, monochrome, clean geometry (store-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- High-detail e-commerce hero banner with modern abstract retail aesthetic, neutral palette (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
- High-detail category tile image: electronics theme, studio lighting (category-electronics.dim_800x800.png)
- High-detail category tile image: fashion theme, studio lighting (category-fashion.dim_800x800.png)
- High-detail category tile image: home & kitchen theme, studio lighting (category-home.dim_800x800.png)
- High-detail product photo set, studio background, premium look (product-01.dim_1024x1024.png)
- High-detail product photo set, studio background, premium look (product-02.dim_1024x1024.png)
- High-detail product photo set, studio background, premium look (product-03.dim_1024x1024.png)
- High-detail product photo set, studio background, premium look (product-04.dim_1024x1024.png)
- High-detail product photo set, studio background, premium look (product-05.dim_1024x1024.png)
- High-detail product photo set, studio background, premium look (product-06.dim_1024x1024.png)
- High-detail product photo set, studio background, premium look (product-07.dim_1024x1024.png)
- High-detail product photo set, studio background, premium look (product-08.dim_1024x1024.png)
- High-detail product photo set, studio background, premium look (product-09.dim_1024x1024.png)
- High-detail product photo set, studio background, premium look (product-10.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a professional e-commerce storefront UI (Amazon/Shopify-like) with a consistent, high-quality visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, component style) suitable for resale as a premium template.
Implement a complete storefront information architecture with key pages: Home, Product Listing (catalog), Product Detail, Cart, Checkout (mock/no payment), and Contact.
Add a prominent branding header that includes a dedicated logo placement area and a clean search bar (UI only) consistent with an Amazon/Shopify-like store experience.
Add an email/contact area in the site (footer and/or Contact page) including a visible business email display and a contact form UI (submission can be stored as an inquiry record).

Implement product catalog support for up to 100 products, including product images, title, price, category, rating (optional), and short description, with a clean catalog grid and filtering/sorting UI.

Seed the application with a curated set of 100 demo products (suitable placeholder data for resale template) that reference locally generated static product images (no external image hotlinking required).
Implement shopping cart functionality: add to cart from product detail (and optionally catalog), adjust quantity, remove items, and show subtotal/estimated total.
Create a polished Home page with a hero section, featured categories/collections, and featured products, using high-detail generated imagery that matches the theme.
Add static generated images to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (logo, hero, and product imagery).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an Amazon/Shopify-like professional e-commerce website layout/template suitable for resale.
Support up to 100 products (product pages/listing) as part of the site structure.
Include product image support/display in the store design.
Add dedicated logo placement area in the website header/branding sections.
Add an email/contact area/field in the website (e.g., header/footer/contact page).
